title: Google I/O 2022 is going to be in-person â€¦  kind of
content:
Earlier today, Google published its traditional I/O puzzle, which is always meant to be a fun way for people to figure out when the Mountain View firm’s developer conference will be held. Now, the company has confirmed the dates and venue for Google I/O 2022. It will be held on May 11 and May 12

The post Google I/O 2022 is going to be in-person … kind of appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google has announced the dates and venue of I/O 2022, and for the first time since 2019, the venue isn't a virtual one.
